name: DrJamesDobson'sFamilyTalkBroadcast
0: ”Alexa, play today's broadcast from Family Talk Broadcast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: family talk broadcast
Developer Terms of Use
des: Welcome to Dr. James Dobson's Family Talk daily broadcast. Join Dr. Dobson as he engages the most important topics of our day for families. Be daily encouraged and find lasting hope for your marriage, your children and your walk with the Lord.
